longBusinessSummary: Echo Defense Projects Inc. focuses on acquiring and developing companies in the national defense, security, and border control. The company is also involved in the development, manufacture, and distribution of LED lighting systems and related products for use in offices, supermarkets, schools, factories, municipal streets, healthcare organizations, retail stores, and gas stations. Its LED lighting products include indoor T-bar flat LED light products, high-bay lighting systems, road/highway LED light products, and area security LED light products. The company markets its LED products through a network of distributors and in-house sales representatives in North America. The company was formerly known as Eco Depot Inc. Echo Defense Projects Inc. was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Pensacola, Florida.
